vamos dixar este sistama 100% funcional , usar  o  banco  postgres Host:5.78.113.107 Username:postgres Port:5432    Requisitos obrigat√≥rios (seguir exatamente)

Frontend simples com React + Tailwind.

Backend em Node.js/Express que sirva uma rota GET /api/data retornando JSON.

Dockerfile separados para backend e frontend.

Compose/Stack para rodar em Docker Swarm, incluindo:

Servi√ßos frontend e backend;

Rede externa network_public (overlay);

Apenas 1 r√©plica de cada servi√ßo;

Labels Traefik configuradas para:

frontend ‚Üí zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br

backend ‚Üí api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br

Sem volumes (services stateless).

Scripts npm run dev e npm run build prontos para frontend e backend (e npm start para produ√ß√£o).

Adicionar um README.md explicando como subir em produ√ß√£o com Docker Swarm.

Entregar a estrutura final do projeto (√°rvore de pastas) conforme se√ß√£o abaixo.

Observa√ß√µes:

Se j√° existir rota semelhante a /api/data, padronize para esse caminho (mantendo compatibilidade se necess√°rio).

Se a base for TypeScript, inclua build/transpile no processo. Caso contr√°rio, use JS puro.

O frontend deve consumir https://api.barbe.zenni-ia.com.br/api/data por padr√£o (via env VITE_API_BASE com fallback).

Sa√≠da ‚Äî ordem obrigat√≥ria

Diagn√≥stico completo (bullet points):

Arquitetura, frameworks, vers√µes, m√≥dulos, rotas/endpoints, modelos, servi√ßos e integra√ß√µes;

Scripts existentes; portas e vari√°veis de ambiente;

O que j√° existe vs o que falta para este escopo.

Plano de a√ß√£o enxuto:

Estrat√©gia de ajustes sem quebrar funcionalidades existentes;

Itens novos a criar; itens a remover/refatorar; compatibilidades.

Artefatos (conte√∫do completo dos arquivos):

frontend/ (React + Tailwind + Vite) consumindo a API:




backend/ (Express com GET /api/data):




deploy/stack.yml (Docker Swarm + Traefik), sem volumes, 1 r√©plica cada, usando a rede externa network_public e labels para os dom√≠nios especificados.

README.md com passo a passo de produ√ß√£o.

Se algum arquivo j√° existir, entregue diff unificado (patch) ou o arquivo inteiro atualizado.

Checklist (Definition of Done) marcando ‚úî/‚úñ:

‚úî Frontend React + Tailwind buildando e consumiapi.barber.zenni-ia.com.br/api/data;

‚úî Backend Express servindo GET /api/data com JSON v√°lido;

‚úî Dockerfiles separados e funcionais (front: build Vite ‚Üí Nginx; back: Node 20-alpine);

‚úî deploy/stack.yml com 2 servi√ßos, 1 r√©plica cada, sem volumes, rede externa ************************************************************************************************************************************************************************network_public, Traefik com dom√≠nios corretos e portas internas certas (front: 80 via Nginx; back: 3001);

‚úî Scripts dev, build, start funcionando em ambos;

‚úî README.md com docker network create --driver overlay network_public, docker swarm init, docker stack deploy -c deploy/stack.yml projeto2, e URLs de verifica√ß√£o;

‚úî √Årvore final entregue.

Pr√≥ximos passos (curto): apontar depend√™ncias externas (DNS, Traefik j√° em execu√ß√£o na network_public, certificados, etc.).




Sem volumes, sem port mapping direto ‚Äî o acesso externo √© pelo Traefik na network_public.

C√≥digo e configs minimalistas e claros, prontos para produ√ß√£o.

Lembrete

Respeite a ordem de sa√≠da.

Gere todo o conte√∫do dos arquivos na resposta.

Se houver ambiguidade na base, documente a suposi√ß√£o e siga com mocks m√≠nimos coerentes com o dom√≠nio do projeto.

file.content:
{
  "name": "sistema-barbearia",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Sistema completo de gest√£o de barbearias com frontend React + backend Express",
  "private": true,
  "workspaces": [
    "frontend",
    "backend"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "dev:frontend": "npm run dev --workspace=frontend",
    "dev:backend": "npm run dev --workspace=backend",
    "build:frontend": "npm run build --workspace=frontend",
    "build:backend": "npm run build --workspace=backend",
    "start:frontend": "npm run start --workspace=frontend",
    "start:backend": "npm run start --workspace=backend",
    "lint:frontend": "npm run lint --workspace=frontend",
    "lint:backend": "npm run lint --workspace=backend",
    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev:backend\" \"npm run dev:frontend\"",
    "build": "npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend",
    "docker:build": "docker build -t barbe-frontend:latest frontend/ && docker build -t barbe-backend:latest backend/",
    "docker:deploy": "docker stack deploy -c deploy/stack.yml barbe"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "concurrently": "^8.2.2"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0",
    "npm": ">=10.0.0"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/seu-usuario/sistema-barbearia.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "barbearia",
    "react",
    "express",
    "docker",
    "swarm",
    "traefik"
  ],
  "author": "Sistema Barbearia",
  "license": "MIT"
}

file.content:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:latest
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:latest
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

file.content:
# Frontend Dockerfile - Vite Build + Nginx
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm install

# Copy source code
COPY . .

# Build the application
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM nginx:alpine

# Copy built files from builder stage
COPY --from=builder /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html

# Copy nginx configuration
COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf

# Expose port 80
EXPOSE 80

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost/ || exit 1

# Start nginx
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

file.content:
# Backend Dockerfile - Node.js Express
FROM node:20-alpine

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install curl for health checks
RUN apk add --no-cache curl

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./

# Install all dependencies (including dev for build)
RUN npm install

# Copy source code
COPY src/ ./src/
COPY tsconfig.json ./

# Build TypeScript
RUN npm run build

# Remove dev dependencies and source files
RUN npm prune --production && rm -rf src/ tsconfig.json

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup -g 1001 -S nodejs && adduser -S backend -u 1001 -G nodejs

# Change ownership
RUN chown -R backend:nodejs /app
USER backend

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3001

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || exit 1

# Start the application
CMD ["npm", "start"]

## 1. Diagn√≥stico Completo

**Arquitetura, Frameworks e Vers√µes:**
- **Frontend**: React 18.3.1 + TypeScript 5.8.3 + Vite 5.4.19 + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Backend**: Node.js 20 + Express 4.18.2 + TypeScript 5.3.3
- **Build**: Vite com SWC, TSX para dev watch
- **Docker**: Dockerfiles prontos, Stack YAML configurado
- **Networking**: Rede externa `network_public` com Traefik
- **Estrutura**: Monorepo com workspaces (frontend/backend)

**M√≥dulos e Depend√™ncias:**
- Frontend: React Query, React Router, React Hook Form, Zod, Lucide React
- Backend: Express, CORS, Helmet, Morgan
- Sem PostgreSQL configurado ainda

**Rotas/Endpoints Existentes:**
- ‚úÖ Backend: `/health`, `/api/data` (mock data)
- ‚úÖ Frontend: Multi-tenant com rotas protegidas

**Scripts Existentes:**
- ‚úÖ `npm run dev` / `npm run build` / `npm start` para ambos
- ‚úÖ Scripts Docker: build, deploy
- ‚úÖ Ports: Frontend 8080 (dev), Backend 3001

**O que j√° existe vs O que falta:**
- ‚úÖ Estrutura completa de containers e Docker Swarm
- ‚úÖ Rota `/api/data` funcionando com mock
- ‚úÖ Frontend React com Tailwind configurado
- ‚ùå **FALTA**: Conex√£o PostgreSQL real
- ‚ùå **FALTA**: Frontend consumindo API correta (ainda usa mock)
- ‚ùå **FALTA**: Vari√°veis de ambiente para PostgreSQL

## 2. Plano de A√ß√£o

**Estrat√©gia sem quebrar funcionalidades:**
1. Adicionar PostgreSQL ao backend mantendo compatibilidade
2. Atualizar `.env` com credenciais do banco fornecido
3. Verificar se frontend est√° consumindo API correta
4. Confirmar Dockerfiles e stack est√£o corretos

**Compatibilidades:**
- Manter rota `/api/data` intacta
- Preservar estrutura Docker existente
- Manter scripts npm funcionais

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:latest
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:latest
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

# Sistema de Barbearia

Sistema completo de gest√£o de barbearias com frontend React + backend Express.

## Caracter√≠sticas

- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Containeriza√ß√£o**: Docker + Docker Swarm + Traefik
- **Banco de Dados**: PostgreSQL
- **Autentica√ß√£o**: Sistema multi-tenant com sele√ß√£o de barbearia

## Desenvolvimento

### Pr√©-requisitos

- Node.js 20+
- npm 10+
- Docker e Docker Swarm (para produ√ß√£o)

### Instala√ß√£o

```bash
# Instalar depend√™ncias de todo o projeto
npm install

# Instalar depend√™ncias do frontend
npm install --workspace=frontend

# Instalar depend√™ncias do backend
npm install --workspace=backend
```

### Scripts Dispon√≠veis

```bash
# Desenvolvimento
npm run dev                 # Inicia frontend + backend em modo desenvolvimento
npm run dev:frontend        # Inicia apenas o frontend
npm run dev:backend         # Inicia apenas o backend

# Build
npm run build               # Build completo (backend + frontend)
npm run build:frontend      # Build apenas frontend
npm run build:backend       # Build apenas backend

# Produ√ß√£o
npm run start:frontend      # Inicia frontend em modo produ√ß√£o
npm run start:backend       # Inicia backend em modo produ√ß√£o

# Lint
npm run lint:frontend       # ESLint no frontend
npm run lint:backend        # ESLint no backend

# Docker
npm run docker:build        # Build das imagens Docker
npm run docker:deploy       # Deploy no Docker Swarm
```

### Desenvolvimento Local

1. **Backend** (porta 3001):
```bash
cd backend
npm run dev
```

2. **Frontend** (porta 8080):
```bash
cd frontend  
npm run dev
```

### Vari√°veis de Ambiente

#### Backend (backend/.env)
```
PORT=3001
NODE_ENV=development
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:8080
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=5432
DB_NAME=barber_system
DB_USER=postgres
DB_PASSWORD=your_password
```

#### Frontend (frontend/.env.local)
```
VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:3001
```

## Produ√ß√£o com Docker Swarm

### Pr√©-requisitos

- Docker Swarm inicializado
- Traefik configurado na rede `network_public`
- DNS apontando para o Swarm

### Deploy

1. **Criar rede externa**:
```bash
docker network create --driver overlay network_public
```

2. **Inicializar Docker Swarm** (se necess√°rio):
```bash
docker swarm init
```

3. **Build das imagens**:
```bash
npm run docker:build
```

4. **Deploy da stack**:
```bash
export DB_PASSWORD="sua_senha_postgres"
docker stack deploy -c deploy/stack.yml barbe
```

### Verifica√ß√£o

- **Frontend**: https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
- **Backend**: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
- **Health Check Backend**: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/health
- **API Data**: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/api/data

### Monitoramento

```bash
# Status dos servi√ßos
docker service ls

# Logs do frontend
docker service logs barbe_frontend

# Logs do backend  
docker service logs barbe_backend

# Escalar servi√ßos (se necess√°rio)
docker service scale barbe_frontend=2
docker service scale barbe_backend=2
```

## Estrutura do Projeto

```
sistema-barbearia/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ frontend/                 # React + TypeScript + Vite
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/      # Componentes React
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/          # P√°ginas/rotas
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lib/            # Utilit√°rios e API client
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ contexts/       # Contextos React
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile          # Container frontend
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx.conf          # Configura√ß√£o Nginx
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ backend/                  # Express + TypeScript
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ server.ts       # Servidor principal
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ database.ts     # Conex√£o PostgreSQL
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile          # Container backend
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ deploy/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ stack.yml           # Docker Swarm stack
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json            # Scripts do monorepo
```

## Tecnologias

### Frontend
- React 18 com TypeScript
- Vite para build r√°pido
- Tailwind CSS para styling
- shadcn/ui para componentes
- React Query para estado do servidor
- React Router para roteamento

### Backend
- Node.js 20 com TypeScript
- Express.js para API REST
- PostgreSQL para banco de dados
- CORS, Helmet para seguran√ßa
- Morgan para logs

### Infraestrutura
- Docker para containeriza√ß√£o
- Docker Swarm para orquestra√ß√£o
- Traefik para proxy reverso
- Let's Encrypt para SSL
- Nginx para servir frontend est√°tico

## API Endpoints

### Backend
- `GET /health` - Health check
- `GET /api/data` - Dados das barbearias, servi√ßos e m√©tricas

### Frontend Routes
- `/` - Landing page
- `/select-barbershop` - Sele√ß√£o de barbearia
- `/dashboard` - Dashboard principal
- `/appointments` - Agendamentos
- `/clients` - Clientes
- `/services` - Servi√ßos
- `/barbers` - Barbeiros
- `/products` - Produtos
- `/sales` - Vendas
- `/pdv` - Ponto de venda

## Pr√≥ximos Passos

1. Configurar banco PostgreSQL com esquema completo
2. Implementar autentica√ß√£o e autoriza√ß√£o
3. Adicionar testes automatizados
4. Configurar CI/CD pipeline
5. Implementar monitoramento e logs centralizados

# Sistema de Barbearia - Produ√ß√£o Docker Swarm

Sistema completo de gest√£o de barbearias com frontend React + backend Express, configurado para produ√ß√£o com Docker Swarm e Traefik.

## üèóÔ∏è Arquitetura de Produ√ß√£o

- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript + PostgreSQL
- **Containeriza√ß√£o**: Docker + Docker Swarm + Traefik
- **Dom√≠nios**:
  - Frontend: `zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`
  - Backend: `api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`

## üöÄ Deploy em Produ√ß√£o (Docker Swarm)

### Pr√©-requisitos

‚úÖ **Servidor com Docker instalado**
‚úÖ **Traefik rodando na rede `network_public`**
‚úÖ **DNS configurado para os dom√≠nios**
‚úÖ **PostgreSQL acess√≠vel em `5.78.113.107:5432`**

### Passo a Passo

#### 1. Criar rede externa (se n√£o existir)
```bash
docker network create --driver overlay network_public
```

#### 2. Inicializar Docker Swarm (se necess√°rio)
```bash
docker swarm init
```

#### 3. Clonar e preparar o projeto
```bash
git clone <seu-repo>
cd sistema-barbearia
```

#### 4. Build das imagens Docker
```bash

```
Isso criar√°:
- `barbe-frontend:latest`
- `barbe-backend:latest`

#### 5. Configurar senha do banco
```bash
export DB_PASSWORD="sua_senha_postgresql_aqui"
```

#### 6. Deploy da stack
```bash

```

### üîç Verifica√ß√£o do Deploy

#### URLs de acesso:
- **Frontend**: https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
- **Backend API**: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/api/data

#### Comandos de monitoramento:

### üêõ Solu√ß√£o de Problemas

#### Verificar se os servi√ßos est√£o rodando:
```bash

```

#### Verificar logs de erro:
```bash

docker service logs barbe_frontend | grep -i error
```

#### Verificar conectividade da rede:
```bash

```

#### Restart dos servi√ßos:
```bash

```

### üìã Configura√ß√£o dos Servi√ßos

#### Frontend (React + Nginx)
- **Porta interna**: 80
- **R√©plicas**: 1
- **Healthcheck**: `curl -f http://localhost/health`
- **Build**: Vite ‚Üí arquivos est√°ticos ‚Üí Nginx

#### Backend (Express + Node.js)
- **Porta interna**: 3001
- **R√©plicas**: 1
- **Healthcheck**: `curl -f http://localhost:3001/health`
- **Vari√°veis de ambiente**: PostgreSQL, CORS, etc.

## üîß Desenvolvimento Local

### Scripts dispon√≠veis:
```bash

# Desenvolvimento individual
```

#### Frontend (`frontend/.env.local`)

## üóÇÔ∏è Estrutura Final do Projeto

```
sistema-barbearia/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ frontend/                    # React + TypeScript + Vite
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
```

## üõ°Ô∏è Recursos de Seguran√ßa

### Traefik Labels Configuradas:

- ‚úÖ **Redirect HTTP ‚Üí HTTPS**

### Backend Security:

```bash

```

### Endpoints de monitoramento:
- `/health` - Status do backend

## ‚ö° Pr√≥ximos Passos

# Sistema de Barbearia - Docker Swarm Deploy

Sistema completo de gest√£o de barbearias com frontend React + backend Express, configurado para deployment em Docker Swarm com Traefik.

## üöÄ Deployment em Produ√ß√£o

### Pr√©-requisitos

1. **Docker Swarm ativo**:
```bash
docker swarm init
```

2. **Rede externa `network_public`**:
```bash
docker network create --driver overlay network_public
```

3. **Traefik rodando** na rede `network_public` com:
   - Let's Encrypt configurado para SSL
   - Entrypoints `web` (80) e `websecure` (443)

### Build das Imagens

**Frontend (React + Vite + Nginx)**:
```bash
docker build -t barbe-frontend:latest frontend/
```

**Backend (Node.js + Express)**:
```bash
docker build -t barbe-backend:latest backend/
```

### Deploy do Stack

**Via workspace raiz**:
```bash
# Usando o package.json raiz
npm run docker:build
npm run docker:deploy

# Ou manualmente
docker build -t barbe-frontend:latest frontend/
docker build -t barbe-backend:latest backend/
docker stack deploy -c deploy/stack.yml barbe
```

### Verifica√ß√£o

**URLs de acesso**:
- Frontend: https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
- Backend API: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/api/data
- Health checks:
  - https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/health
  - https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/health

**Verificar servi√ßos ativos**:
```bash
docker service ls
docker stack ps barbe
```

### Logs

```bash
# Frontend logs
docker service logs barbe_frontend -f

# Backend logs
docker service logs barbe_backend -f
```

## üõ† Desenvolvimento Local

### Via workspace raiz (recomendado)
```bash
# Instalar depend√™ncias de ambos os projetos
npm install --workspaces

# Executar ambos simultaneamente
npm run dev

# Ou executar separadamente
npm run dev:frontend  # Frontend em http://localhost:8080
npm run dev:backend   # Backend API em http://localhost:3001
```

### Frontend apenas
```bash
cd frontend
npm install
npm run dev
# Acesse: http://localhost:8080
```

### Backend apenas
```bash
cd backend
npm install
npm run dev
# API: http://localhost:3001/api/data
```

## üìÅ Estrutura do Projeto

```
sistema-barbearia/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ frontend/                     # React + Vite + Tailwind
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/          # Componentes shadcn/ui (48 componentes)
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/               # 13 p√°ginas da aplica√ß√£o
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ contexts/            # Context providers
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lib/                 # API client e utils
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks/              # Custom hooks
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile              # Multi-stage: build + nginx
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx.conf              # Configura√ß√£o Nginx
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env                    # VITE_API_BASE produ√ß√£o
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env.local              # VITE_API_BASE desenvolvimento
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json            # Scripts: dev, build, start
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ backend/                     # Express + TypeScript
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ server.ts           # Servidor principal + /api/data
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile              # Node 20 alpine
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tsconfig.json           # Config TypeScript
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env                    # Vari√°veis desenvolvimento
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json            # Scripts: dev, build, start
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ deploy/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ stack.yml               # Docker Swarm stack completo
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json                # Workspace raiz com scripts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .gitignore                  # Atualizado para workspace
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                   # Este arquivo
```

## üîß Configura√ß√£o

### Vari√°veis de Ambiente

**Frontend (produ√ß√£o)**:
```bash
# frontend/.env
VITE_API_BASE=https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
```

**Frontend (desenvolvimento)**:
```bash
# frontend/.env.local
VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:3001
```

**Backend (desenvolvimento)**:
```bash
# backend/.env
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=3001
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:8080
```

**Backend (produ√ß√£o via Docker)**:
```bash
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=3001
FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
```

### Dom√≠nios Configurados

- **Frontend**: `zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`
- **Backend**: `api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`

## üìä Funcionalidades

### Frontend (React)
- ‚úÖ Dashboard com m√©tricas
- ‚úÖ Gest√£o de agendamentos
- ‚úÖ Cadastro de clientes
- ‚úÖ Gest√£o de barbeiros
- ‚úÖ Cat√°logo de servi√ßos
- ‚úÖ Controle de produtos
- ‚úÖ Sistema de vendas (PDV)
- ‚úÖ Painel super admin
- ‚úÖ Multi-barbearia (Context)
- ‚úÖ Design system (shadcn/ui)

### Backend (Express)
- ‚úÖ API REST com TypeScript
- ‚úÖ Rota GET `/api/data` (JSON)
- ‚úÖ Health check `/health`
- ‚úÖ CORS configurado
- ‚úÖ Security headers (Helmet)
- ‚úÖ Request logging (Morgan)

## üê≥ Docker

### Caracter√≠sticas

- **Stateless**: Sem volumes persistentes
- **1 r√©plica** de cada servi√ßo
- **Health checks** configurados
- **Rolling updates** com rollback autom√°tico
- **SSL/HTTPS** via Traefik + Let's Encrypt
- **CORS** configurado para comunica√ß√£o frontend ‚Üî backend

### Rede

Todos os servi√ßos utilizam a rede externa `network_public` (overlay) para comunica√ß√£o com Traefik.

## üîç Troubleshooting

### Problemas Comuns

1. **Servi√ßos n√£o iniciam**:
```bash
docker stack ps barbe --no-trunc
```

2. **SSL n√£o funciona**:
   - Verificar se Traefik est√° rodando
   - Confirmar configura√ß√£o Let's Encrypt
   - Checar DNS dos dom√≠nios

3. **Frontend n√£o acessa backend**:
   - Verificar CORS no backend
   - Confirmar vari√°vel `VITE_API_BASE`
   - Testar API diretamente: `curl https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/health`

### Comandos √öteis

```bash
# Remover stack
docker stack rm barbe

# Rebuild e redeploy (via workspace)
npm run docker:build
npm run docker:deploy

# Ou manualmente
docker build -t barbe-frontend:latest frontend/
docker build -t barbe-backend:latest backend/
docker stack deploy -c deploy/stack.yml barbe

# Verificar rede
docker network ls | grep network_public

# Status dos servi√ßos
docker service ps barbe_frontend
docker service ps barbe_backend
```

## üìà Pr√≥ximos Passos

### Depend√™ncias Externas
- ‚úÖ DNS configurado para os dom√≠nios
- ‚úÖ Traefik rodando com Let's Encrypt
- ‚úÖ Rede `network_public` criada
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Certificados SSL autom√°ticos
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Monitoramento dos servi√ßos

### Melhorias Futuras
- Base de dados PostgreSQL
- Sistema de autentica√ß√£o JWT
- Upload de arquivos
- Notifica√ß√µes em tempo real
- Backup automatizado
- CI/CD pipeline
- Monitoramento (Prometheus/Grafana)

## üóÇÔ∏è Estrutura Final do Projeto

```
sistema-barbearia/
```

## üõ°Ô∏è Recursos de Seguran√ßa


### Endpoints de monitoramento:
- `/health` - Status do backend
- `/health` - Status do frontend (via nginx)

## ‚ö° Pr√≥ximos Passos

# Sistema de Barbearia - Produ√ß√£o Docker Swarm

Sistema completo de gest√£o de barbearias com frontend React + backend Express, configurado para produ√ß√£o com Docker Swarm e Traefik.

## üèóÔ∏è Arquitetura de Produ√ß√£o

- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript + PostgreSQL
- **Containeriza√ß√£o**: Docker + Docker Swarm + Traefik
- **Dom√≠nios**:
  - Frontend: `zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`
  - Backend: `api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`

## üöÄ Deploy em Produ√ß√£o (Docker Swarm)

### Pr√©-requisitos

‚úÖ **Servidor com Docker instalado**
‚úÖ **Traefik rodando na rede `network_public`**
‚úÖ **DNS configurado para os dom√≠nios**
‚úÖ **PostgreSQL acess√≠vel em `5.78.113.107:5432`**

### Passo a Passo

#### 1. Criar rede externa (se n√£o existir)
```bash
docker network create --driver overlay network_public
```

#### 2. Inicializar Docker Swarm (se necess√°rio)
```bash
docker swarm init
```

#### 3. Clonar e preparar o projeto
```bash
git clone <seu-repo>
cd sistema-barbearia
```

#### 4. Build das imagens Docker
```bash
npm run docker:build
```
Isso criar√°:
- `barbe-frontend:latest`
- `barbe-backend:latest`

#### 5. Configurar senha do banco
```bash
export DB_PASSWORD="sua_senha_postgresql_aqui"
```

#### 6. Deploy da stack
```bash
docker stack deploy -c deploy/stack.yml barbe
```

### üîç Verifica√ß√£o do Deploy

#### URLs de acesso:
- **Frontend**: https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
- **Backend API**: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/api/data
- **Health Check**: https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/health

#### Comandos de monitoramento:
```bash
# Status dos servi√ßos
docker service ls

# Logs em tempo real
docker service logs -f barbe_frontend
docker service logs -f barbe_backend

# Detalhes dos servi√ßos
docker service ps barbe_frontend
docker service ps barbe_backend
```

### üêõ Solu√ß√£o de Problemas

#### Verificar se os servi√ßos est√£o rodando:
```bash
docker service ls | grep barbe
```

#### Verificar logs de erro:
```bash
docker service logs barbe_backend | grep -i error
docker service logs barbe_frontend | grep -i error
```

#### Verificar conectividade da rede:
```bash
docker network ls | grep network_public
```

#### Restart dos servi√ßos:
```bash
docker service update --force barbe_frontend
docker service update --force barbe_backend
```

### üìã Configura√ß√£o dos Servi√ßos

#### Frontend (React + Nginx)
- **Porta interna**: 80
- **R√©plicas**: 1
- **Healthcheck**: `curl -f http://localhost/health`
- **Build**: Vite ‚Üí arquivos est√°ticos ‚Üí Nginx

#### Backend (Express + Node.js)
- **Porta interna**: 3001
- **R√©plicas**: 1
- **Healthcheck**: `curl -f http://localhost:3001/health`
- **Vari√°veis de ambiente**: PostgreSQL, CORS, etc.

## üîß Desenvolvimento Local

### Scripts dispon√≠veis:
```bash
# Desenvolvimento completo
npm run dev                 # Frontend (8080) + Backend (3001)

# Desenvolvimento individual
npm run dev:frontend        # Apenas frontend na porta 8080
npm run dev:backend         # Apenas backend na porta 3001

# Build de produ√ß√£o
npm run build               # Build completo
npm run build:frontend      # Build apenas frontend
npm run build:backend       # Build apenas backend

# Lint
npm run lint:frontend       # ESLint frontend
npm run lint:backend        # ESLint backend
```

### Vari√°veis de ambiente de desenvolvimento:

#### Backend (`backend/.env`)
```bash
PORT=3001
NODE_ENV=development
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:8080
DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
DB_PORT=5432
DB_NAME=barber_system
DB_USER=postgres
DB_PASSWORD=sua_senha_aqui
```

#### Frontend (`frontend/.env.local`)
```bash
VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:3001
```

## üóÇÔ∏è Estrutura Final do Projeto

```
sistema-barbearia/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ frontend/                    # React + TypeScript + Vite
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/

‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/          # Custom components

‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ contexts/           # React contexts
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ main.tsx            # App entry
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile              # Multi-stage: build ‚Üí nginx
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx.conf              # Nginx config
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env.production         # Prod env vars
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json            # Frontend deps
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ backend/                     # Express + TypeScript
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ server.ts           # Main server
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ database.ts         # PostgreSQL connection
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile              # Node.js 20-alpine
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env.example            # Env template
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json            # Backend deps
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ deploy/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ stack.yml               # Docker Swarm stack
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json                # Root workspace
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                   # Este arquivo
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ CLAUDE.md                   # Development instructions
```

## üõ°Ô∏è Recursos de Seguran√ßa

### Traefik Labels Configuradas:
- ‚úÖ **HTTPS autom√°tico** (Let's Encrypt)
- ‚úÖ **Redirect HTTP ‚Üí HTTPS**
- ‚úÖ **Headers CORS** para backend
- ‚úÖ **Headers de seguran√ßa** no Nginx

### Backend Security:
- ‚úÖ **Helmet.js** para headers de seguran√ßa
- ‚úÖ **CORS** configurado para frontend
- ‚úÖ **Rate limiting** impl√≠cito via Traefik
- ‚úÖ **Health checks** configurados

## üìä Monitoramento

### Logs estruturados:
```bash
# Logs com filtros
docker service logs barbe_backend 2>&1 | grep "ERROR"
docker service logs barbe_frontend 2>&1 | grep "404"

# M√©tricas de performance
curl -s https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br/health | jq
```

### Endpoints de monitoramento:
- `/health` - Status do backend
- `/health` - Status do frontend (via nginx)

## ‚ö° Pr√≥ximos Passos

### Depend√™ncias Externas:
1. **DNS**: Certificar que `*.zenni-ia.com.br` aponta para o servidor

input.content:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250921-163405
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250921-163405
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=barber_system
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Calendar, Users, TrendingUp, DollarSign, Clock, Scissors, ArrowUpRight, Star, Plus, UserPlus } from 'lucide-react'; import { useBarbershop } from '@/contexts/BarbershopContext'; import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query'; import { apiClient, ApiDataResponse } from '@/lib/api'; const Dashboard = () => { const { currentBarbershop } = useBarbershop(); // Fetch data from API const { data: apiData, isLoading, error } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['api-data'], queryFn: () => apiClient.get('/api/data'), refetchInterval: 60000, // Refetch every minute }); // Use API data or fallback to mock data const stats = apiData ? import { useState } from 'react'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, } from '@/components/ui/table'; import { Plus, Search, Phone, Mail, Calendar, MoreHorizontal } from 'lucide-react'; import { useBarbershop } from '@/contexts/BarbershopContext'; const Clients = () => { const { currentBarbershop } = useBarbershop(); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); // Mock data - TODO: Replace with real data from Supabase const clients = [ { id: '1', name: 'Jo√£o Silva', phone: '(11) 99999-9999', email: 'joao@email.com', lastVisit: '2024-01-15', totalVisits: 12, totalSpent: 840, status: 'active', preferredBarber: 'Carlos' }, { id: '2', name: 'Pedro Santos', phone: '(11) 88888-8888', email: 'pedro@email.com', lastVisit: '2024-01-10', totalVisits: 8, totalSpent: 560, status: 'active', preferredBarber: 'Rafael' }, { id: '3', name: 'Lucas Oliveira', phone: '(11) 77777-7777', email: 'lucas@email.com', lastVisit: '2023-12-20', totalVisits: 25, totalSpent: 1750, status: 'vip', preferredBarber: 'Carlos' }, { id: '4', name: 'Miguel Costa', phone: '(11) 66666-6666', email: 'miguel@email.com', lastVisit: '2024-01-08', totalVisits: 5, totalSpent: 350, status: 'active', preferredBarber: 'Rafael' } ]; const filteredClients = clients.filter(client => client.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || client.phone.includes(searchTerm) || client.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const stats = { totalClients: clients.length, activeClients: clients.filter(c => c.status === 'active').length, vipClients: clients.filter(c => c.status === 'vip').length, averageSpent: Math.round(clients.reduce((acc, c) => acc + c.totalSpent, 0) / clients.length) }; return (

**Database Schema:**
```sql
CREATE TABLE clients (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    address TEXT,
    preferred_barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vip
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

**API Endpoints:**
```typescript
GET    /api/clients                // Listar clientes com filtros
POST   /api/clients                // Cadastrar cliente
PUT    /api/clients/:id            // Atualizar cliente
DELETE /api/clients/:id            // Deletar cliente
GET    /api/clients/:id/history    // Hist√≥rico do cliente
GET    /api/clients/search         // Busca avan√ßada
```

**Funcionalidades a implementar:**
- Hist√≥rico completo de atendimentos
- Sistema de fidelidade/pontos
- Aniversariantes do m√™s
- Exporta√ß√£o de dados
- Campanhas de marketing

### 4. üí∞ **PDV - Ponto de Venda**

**Database Schema:**
```sql
CREATE TABLE sales (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id),
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id),
    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    total DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50), -- cash, card, pix
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'completed', -- pending, completed, cancelled
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sale_items (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    sale_id UUID REFERENCES sales(id),
    item_type VARCHAR(20), -- service, product
    item_id UUID, -- service_id ou product_id
    quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);
```

**API Endpoints:**
```typescript
POST   /api/sales                  // Registrar venda
GET    /api/sales                  // Listar vendas
GET    /api/sales/:id              // Detalhes da venda
PUT    /api/sales/:id              // Atualizar venda
GET    /api/sales/daily            // Vendas do dia
GET    /api/sales/summary          // Resumo de vendas
```

**Database Schema:**
```sql
CREATE TABLE barbers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), -- se tiver sistema de auth
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    photo_url TEXT,
    specialty TEXT[], -- array de especialidades
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00, -- porcentagem
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vacation
    hire_date DATE,
    working_hours JSONB, -- hor√°rios de trabalho por dia
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE barber_services (
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id),
    PRIMARY KEY (barber_id, service_id)
);
```

**API Endpoints:**
```typescript
GET    /api/barbers                    // Listar barbeiros
POST   /api/barbers                    // Cadastrar barbeiro
PUT    /api/barbers/:id                // Atualizar barbeiro
DELETE /api/barbers/:id               // Remover barbeiro
GET    /api/barbers/:id/performance    // Performance do barbeiro
GET    /api/barbers/:id/schedule       // Agenda do barbeiro
```

### 6. üõ†Ô∏è **Servi√ßos - Cat√°logo de Servi√ßos**

**Database Schema:**
```sql
CREATE TABLE services (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100), -- corte, barba, combo, etc
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,

    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

**Database Schema:**
```sql
CREATE TABLE products (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100), -- pomada, shampoo, lamina, etc
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    barcode VARCHAR(50),
    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2), -- pre√ßo de custo
    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2), -- pre√ßo de venda
    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5, -- estoque m√≠nimo
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(id),
    movement_type VARCHAR(20), -- in, out, adjustment
    quantity INTEGER,
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    reference_id UUID, -- sale_id ou purchase_id
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
```


content.text:
# üöÄ Fase 1: Database & Core API

## Passo 1: Criar Schema Completo PostgreSQL

Vou criar o arquivo com todas as tabelas necess√°rias para o sistema completo:

input.content:
-- ===============================================
-- SISTEMA DE BARBEARIA - SCHEMA COMPLETO
-- ===============================================

-- Extension para UUID
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pgcrypto";

-- ===============================================
-- 1. TABELA BARBEARIAS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE barbershops (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    logo_url TEXT,
    address JSONB,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    plan_id VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'basic',
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    owner_id UUID,
    settings JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 2. TABELA BARBEIROS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE barbers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    photo_url TEXT,
    specialty TEXT[],
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vacation
    hire_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    working_hours JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 3. TABELA CLIENTES
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE clients (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    address TEXT,
    preferred_barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vip
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 4. TABELA SERVI√áOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE services (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100),
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 5. TABELA PRODUTOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE products (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100),
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    barcode VARCHAR(50),
    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 6. TABELA AGENDAMENTOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE appointments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'scheduled', -- scheduled, confirmed, in_progress, completed, cancelled
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 7. TABELA VENDAS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE sales (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id),
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id),
    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    total DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'completed',
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 8. TABELA ITENS DE VENDA
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE sale_items (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    sale_id UUID REFERENCES sales(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- service, product
    item_id UUID NOT NULL,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 9. TABELA MOVIMENTA√á√ïES DE ESTOQUE
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    movement_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- in, out, adjustment
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    reference_id UUID,
    previous_stock INTEGER,
    new_stock INTEGER,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 10. TABELA BARBEIROS x SERVI√áOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE barber_services (
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    PRIMARY KEY (barber_id, service_id)
);

-- ===============================================
-- √çNDICES PARA PERFORMANCE
-- ===============================================

-- √çndices para busca r√°pida
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_date ON appointments(appointment_date);
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_barber ON appointments(barber_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_client ON appointments(client_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_sales_date ON sales(sale_date);
CREATE INDEX idx_clients_phone ON clients(phone);
CREATE INDEX idx_products_barcode ON products(barcode);

-- √çndices compostos
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_barber_date ON appointments(barber_id, appointment_date);
CREATE INDEX idx_sales_barbershop_date ON sales(barbershop_id, sale_date);

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGERS PARA ATUALIZA√á√ÉO AUTOM√ÅTICA
-- ===============================================

-- Trigger para updated_at
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    NEW.updated_at = NOW();
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

-- Aplicar trigger em todas as tabelas relevantes
CREATE TRIGGER update_barbershops_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbershops FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_barbers_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbers FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_clients_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON clients FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_services_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON services FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_products_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON products FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_appointments_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON appointments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_sales_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON sales FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGER PARA ATUALIZAR ESTAT√çSTICAS DO CLIENTE
-- ===============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_client_stats()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    -- Atualizar total de visitas e gastos quando um agendamento √© completado
    IF NEW.status = 'completed' AND (OLD.status IS NULL OR OLD.status != 'completed') THEN
        UPDATE clients SET
            total_visits = total_visits + 1,
            total_spent = total_spent + COALESCE(NEW.price, 0)
        WHERE id = NEW.client_id;
    END IF;

    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

CREATE TRIGGER update_client_stats_trigger
    AFTER UPDATE ON appointments
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_client_stats();

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGER PARA CONTROLE DE ESTOQUE
-- ===============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_product_stock()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    -- Atualizar estoque quando h√° movimento
    UPDATE products SET
        current_stock = NEW.new_stock
    WHERE id = NEW.product_id;

    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

CREATE TRIGGER update_product_stock_trigger
    AFTER INSERT ON stock_movements
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_product_stock();

-- ===============================================
-- DADOS INICIAIS
-- ===============================================

-- Inserir barbearias iniciais
INSERT INTO barbershops (name, slug, address, phone, plan_id, is_active) VALUES
('Barbearia Cl√°ssica', 'barbearia-classica',
 '{"street":"Rua das Flores, 123","city":"S√£o Paulo","state":"SP","zipCode":"01234-567"}',
 '(11) 99999-9999', 'premium', true),

 '(11) 88888-8888', 'basic', true);

(VALUES

    ('Rafael Santos', '(11) 92222-2222', 'Barba', 55.00),
    ('Jo√£o Oliveira', '(11) 93333-3333', 'Corte + Barba', 65.00),

-- Inserir servi√ßos iniciais

    b.id,
    service_name,
    description,
    category,
    duration,
    price,

FROM barbershops b,
(VALUES

-- Inserir produtos iniciais

    b.id,

(VALUES

    ('L√¢mina de Barbear', 'L√¢minas descart√°veis', 'lamina', 'Gillette', 2.50, 8.00, 50, 10),
    ('Cera Modeladora', 'Cera para fixa√ß√£o', 'cera', 'American Crew', 18.00, 42.00, 12, 3)
) AS v(product_name, description, category, brand, cost_price, sell_price, stock, min_stock)
WHERE b.slug = 'barbearia-classica';

-- Inserir clientes iniciais
INSERT INTO clients (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, preferred_barber_id, total_visits, total_spent, status)
SELECT
    b.id,
    client_name,
    phone,
    email,
    br.id,
    visits,
    spent,
    status
FROM barbershops b
CROSS JOIN (VALUES
    ('Jo√£o Silva', '(11) 99999-9999', 'joao@email.com', 'Carlos Silva', 12, 840.00, 'active'),
    ('Pedro Santos', '(11) 88888-8888', 'pedro@email.com', 'Rafael Santos', 8, 560.00, 'active'),

    ('Antonio Lima', 'Andr√© Costa', 'Corte Infantil', '14:00', 'confirmed')
) AS v(client_name, barber_name, service_name, appointment_time, status)
LEFT JOIN clients c ON c.name = v.client_name AND c.barbershop_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN barbers br ON br.name = v.barber_name AND br.barbershop_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON s.name = v.service_name AND s.barbershop_id = b.id
WHERE b.slug = 'barbearia-classica';

-- ===============================================
-- VIEWS PARA RELAT√ìRIOS
-- ===============================================

-- View para m√©tricas do dashboard
CREATE VIEW dashboard_metrics AS
SELECT
    b.id as barbershop_id,
    b.name as barbershop_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = b.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE) as appointments_today,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients c WHERE c.barbershop_id = b.id AND c.status = 'active') as total_clients,
    (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) FROM sales s WHERE s.barbershop_id = b.id AND DATE_TRUNC('month', s.sale_date) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)) as revenue_month,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = b.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE AND a.status = 'completed') as completed_today,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = b.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE AND a.status IN ('scheduled', 'confirmed')) as pending_today
FROM barbershops b
WHERE b.is_active = true;

-- View para agendamentos com detalhes
CREATE VIEW appointments_detailed AS
SELECT
    a.id,
    a.barbershop_id,
    c.name as client_name,
    c.phone as client_phone,
    br.name as barber_name,
    s.name as service_name,
    a.appointment_date,
    a.appointment_time,
    a.duration,
    a.status,
    a.price,
    a.notes,
    a.created_at
FROM appointments a
LEFT JOIN clients c ON a.client_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN barbers br ON a.barber_id = br.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON a.service_id = s.id;

COMMIT;

-- ===============================================
-- SISTEMA DE BARBEARIA - SCHEMA COMPLETO
-- ===============================================

-- Extension para UUID
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pgcrypto";

-- ===============================================
-- 1. TABELA BARBEARIAS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE barbershops (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    logo_url TEXT,
    address JSONB,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    plan_id VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'basic',
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    owner_id UUID,
    settings JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 2. TABELA BARBEIROS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE barbers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    photo_url TEXT,
    specialty TEXT[],
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vacation
    hire_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    working_hours JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 3. TABELA CLIENTES
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE clients (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    address TEXT,
    preferred_barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vip
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 4. TABELA SERVI√áOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE services (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100),
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 5. TABELA PRODUTOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE products (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100),
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    barcode VARCHAR(50),
    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 6. TABELA AGENDAMENTOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE appointments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'scheduled', -- scheduled, confirmed, in_progress, completed, cancelled
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 7. TABELA VENDAS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE sales (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id),
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id),
    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    total DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'completed',
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 8. TABELA ITENS DE VENDA
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE sale_items (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    sale_id UUID REFERENCES sales(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- service, product
    item_id UUID NOT NULL,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 9. TABELA MOVIMENTA√á√ïES DE ESTOQUE
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    movement_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- in, out, adjustment
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    reference_id UUID,
    previous_stock INTEGER,
    new_stock INTEGER,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 10. TABELA BARBEIROS x SERVI√áOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE barber_services (
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    PRIMARY KEY (barber_id, service_id)
);

-- ===============================================
-- √çNDICES PARA PERFORMANCE
-- ===============================================

-- √çndices para busca r√°pida
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_date ON appointments(appointment_date);
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_barber ON appointments(barber_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_client ON appointments(client_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_sales_date ON sales(sale_date);
CREATE INDEX idx_clients_phone ON clients(phone);
CREATE INDEX idx_products_barcode ON products(barcode);

-- √çndices compostos
CREATE INDEX idx_appointments_barber_date ON appointments(barber_id, appointment_date);
CREATE INDEX idx_sales_barbershop_date ON sales(barbershop_id, sale_date);

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGERS PARA ATUALIZA√á√ÉO AUTOM√ÅTICA
-- ===============================================

-- Trigger para updated_at
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    NEW.updated_at = NOW();
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

-- Aplicar trigger em todas as tabelas relevantes
CREATE TRIGGER update_barbershops_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbershops FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_barbers_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbers FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_clients_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON clients FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_services_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON services FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_products_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON products FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_appointments_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON appointments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_sales_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON sales FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGER PARA ATUALIZAR ESTAT√çSTICAS DO CLIENTE
-- ===============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_client_stats()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    -- Atualizar total de visitas e gastos quando um agendamento √© completado
    IF NEW.status = 'completed' AND (OLD.status IS NULL OR OLD.status != 'completed') THEN
        UPDATE clients SET
            total_visits = total_visits + 1,
            total_spent = total_spent + COALESCE(NEW.price, 0)
        WHERE id = NEW.client_id;
    END IF;

    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

CREATE TRIGGER update_client_stats_trigger
    AFTER UPDATE ON appointments
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_client_stats();

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGER PARA CONTROLE DE ESTOQUE
-- ===============================================

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_product_stock()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    -- Atualizar estoque quando h√° movimento
    UPDATE products SET
        current_stock = NEW.new_stock
    WHERE id = NEW.product_id;

    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

CREATE TRIGGER update_product_stock_trigger
    AFTER INSERT ON stock_movements
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_product_stock();

-- ===============================================
-- DADOS INICIAIS
-- ===============================================

-- Inserir barbearias iniciais
INSERT INTO barbershops (name, slug, address, phone, plan_id, is_active) VALUES

-- Inserir servi√ßos iniciais

-- Inserir produtos iniciais

    ('L√¢mina de Barbear', 'L√¢minas descart√°veis', 'lamina', 'Gillette', 2.50, 8.00, 50, 10),
    ('Cera Modeladora', 'Cera para fixa√ß√£o', 'cera', 'American Crew', 18.00, 42.00, 12, 3)
) AS v(product_name, description, category, brand, cost_price, sell_price, stock, min_stock)

-- Inserir clientes iniciais
INSERT INTO clients (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, preferred_barber_id, total_visits, total_spent, status)
SELECT
    b.id,
    client_name,

CROSS JOIN (VALUES

-- Inserir agendamentos de exemplo para hoje
INSERT INTO appointments (barbershop_id, client_id, barber_id, service_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, duration, status, price)
SELECT
    b.id,
    c.id,
    br.id,
    s.id,
    CURRENT_DATE,
    appointment_time::TIME,
    s.duration,
    status,
    s.price
FROM barbershops b
CROSS JOIN (VALUES
    ('Jo√£o Silva', 'Carlos Silva', 'Corte Masculino', '09:00', 'confirmed'),
    ('Pedro Santos', 'Rafael Santos', 'Barba Completa', '09:30', 'pending'),
    ('Lucas Oliveira', 'Carlos Silva', 'Corte + Barba', '10:15', 'completed'),
    ('Miguel Costa', 'Jo√£o Oliveira', 'Corte + Barba', '11:00', 'confirmed'),
    ('Antonio Lima', 'Andr√© Costa', 'Corte Infantil', '14:00', 'confirmed')
) AS v(client_name, barber_name, service_name, appointment_time, status)
LEFT JOIN clients c ON c.name = v.client_name AND c.barbershop_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN barbers br ON br.name = v.barber_name AND br.barbershop_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON s.name = v.service_name AND s.barbershop_id = b.id
WHERE b.slug = 'barbearia-classica';

-- ===============================================
-- VIEWS PARA RELAT√ìRIOS
-- ===============================================

-- View para m√©tricas do dashboard
CREATE VIEW dashboard_metrics AS
SELECT
    b.id as barbershop_id,
    b.name as barbershop_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = b.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE) as appointments_today,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients c WHERE c.barbershop_id = b.id AND c.status = 'active') as total_clients,
    (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) FROM sales s WHERE s.barbershop_id = b.id AND DATE_TRUNC('month', s.sale_date) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)) as revenue_month,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = b.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE AND a.status = 'completed') as completed_today,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = b.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE AND a.status IN ('scheduled', 'confirmed')) as pending_today
FROM barbershops b
WHERE b.is_active = true;

-- View para agendamentos com detalhes
CREATE VIEW appointments_detailed AS
SELECT
    a.id,
    a.barbershop_id,
    c.name as client_name,
    c.phone as client_phone,
    br.name as barber_name,
    s.name as service_name,
    a.appointment_date,
    a.appointment_time,
    a.duration,
    a.status,
    a.price,
    a.notes,
    a.created_at
FROM appointments a
LEFT JOIN clients c ON a.client_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN barbers br ON a.barber_id = br.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON a.service_id = s.id;

COMMIT;
